name: Nice Serve! Volleyball
description:
Little project based in the Rival Schools 2 volleyball mini game. I plan to expand the game and add new game modes and multiplayer matches in the future.

Hope you enjoy it! (Pls leave a comment)

Commands:

Touch the ball on the bottom right corner of the screen once to throw it up, and touch it a second time to hit the ball. The higher you hit the ball, the longer it will be launched.

Try to make as many points as you can!
